channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Evolution
channel.desc: When a meteor crashes on Earth, it brings with it single-celled organisms which evolve rapidly. Later, four professionals stumble upon these aliens and must stop their growth to avoid an invasion.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Gran Turismo: Based on a True Story
channel.desc: With the help of a mechanic having a tragic past, an avid player of racing video games attempts to become a professional car racer.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Underworld: Evolution
channel.desc: Vampire warrior Selene and the half-werewolf Michael search for hints to understand the history of their races and the intense conflicts between them.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Never Back Down 2: The Beatdown
channel.desc: Four fighters from different backgrounds come together to train under a former MMA star. Ultimately, they have to fight each other and also the traitor who hides among them.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vanguard
channel.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Grown Ups
channel.desc: Five childhood friends take their families for a weekend trip to a lake house in their hometown, where they reunite to attend the funeral of their former high school basketball coach.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
channel.desc: After years of peace, Mr Fox breaks his promise and raids the farms of his human neighbours. However, the sly fox and his furry gang get back at three nefarious farmers who have declared war on them.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Ultraviolet
channel.desc: A female rebel is infected with a virus that provides her with superhuman abilities. Thereafter, she tries to safeguard a boy in a futuristic world, who carries the virus's antigen.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Rob-B-Hood
channel.desc: Two thieves kidnap a wealthy family's baby for a crime boss in exchange for money. Upon developing a strong bond with the infant, they try to protect him from the latter.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: White Haired Devil Lady
channel.desc: Taking advantage of the emperor's illness, a eunuch in the Ming Dynasty attempts to seize power over the kingdom. However, complications arise when the king is cured.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Israel Weapon
channel.desc: The host provides a detailed report featuring insightful updates and developments pertaining to matters pertaining to the weapons in Israel.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Shinjuku Incident
channel.desc: A humble Chinese immigrant battles a powerful global crime syndicate risking everything to take on one of the world's most dangerous criminal empires.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Surf's Up
channel.desc: Followed by a documentary film crew, Cody Maverick, a 17-year-old penguin, travels from Antarctica to Pen Gu Island hoping to win the Big Z Memorial Surf Off.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Ip Man
channel.desc: A martial artist is forced to leave his home due to a war in 1937. In a twist of fate, he ends up establishing a school to train others in self-defence.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Chang'An Fog Monster
channel.desc: When a mysterious fog containing monsters engulfs a city, a prince and his guard get caught in its midst. The latter must find a way to protect the royalty and the people.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Spotlight
channel.desc: Martin Baron joins the Boston Globe as an editor and pushes four journalists to pursue a story about the child molestation charges against the local church.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.desc: Micky, a maths professor, enlists five gifted students to use their abilities to win millions at blackjack in Las Vegas. He exploits their talents for personal gain in the glamorous casino city.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Dance With Me
channel.desc: Shakti and Mukti Mohan discuss classical dance forms, followed by performances of the same by participants. The audience must choose the victor.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Chef vs Fridge
channel.desc: Gaurav Gera and Vicky Ratnani engage in a lively game with Chef Kiran and Chef Harpal. The chefs then showcase their culinary skills by preparing themed dishes.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Hotel Mumbai
channel.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Just My Luck
channel.desc: After kissing a stranger at a party, Ashley Albright, a lucky woman, notices her good luck taking a turn for the worse.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
channel.desc: A subway dispatcher's day is thrown into chaos when four armed men hijack the subway train and take the commuters as hostages. They demand USD 10 million from the mayor as ransom.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Gridiron Gang
channel.desc: Sean Porter works at a juvenile detention centre where the children suffer from low self-esteem. To build their morale, he decides to mould them into a winning football team.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vincent N Roxxy
channel.desc: An unlikely romance develops between Vincent, a loner, and Roxxy, a rebel, while they are on the run to save their lives. However, their violent past seems to catch up with them wherever they go.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Lawless
channel.desc: Three siblings operate an illegal moonshine business using their restaurant as a front. Things take a turn when the oldest brother, Forrest, refuses to pay a bribe to a corrupt lawman.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Absolutely Anything
channel.desc: A group of eccentric aliens gives an ordinary human being named Neil the limitless power to do anything he wants. Unbeknownst to Neil, this is an experiment to see if Earth deserves to be destroyed.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Knights of the Zodiac
channel.desc: Teenager Seiya makes a living fighting on the streets while searching for his kidnapped sister. However, his life changes when he taps into mystical powers he never knew he had.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Wrong Place
channel.desc: Jake, the son of the notorious drug dealer Virgil, goes after former policeman Frank's daughter to stop him from testifying against his father. However, an unexpected surprise awaits him.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Jawbreaker
channel.desc: Three popular high school girls, Courtney, Marcie and Julie, find themselves in serious trouble after Liz suffocates and dies from a jawbreaker.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Philadelphia
channel.desc: A young Philadelphia lawyer who is infected with AIDS keeps his homosexuality hidden from his employers. When he is suddenly dismissed, he hires a homophobic lawyer for a wrongful dismissal suit.
